entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:25 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: SE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
